articles.content: Over the weekend, we brought you news about a new bug with the Windows 10 Check Disk Utility (chkdsk) that is crippling some PCs. The bug was unfortunately introduced with KB4592438 for Windows 10 20… [+2055 chars]

articles.title: TikTok’s latest feature highlights your favorite videos from 2020 - Engadget
articles.description: For the first time in history, TikTok is tailoring its yearly recap to its users.
articles.content: 2020 was a rollercoaster year for TikTok. A constantly changing deadline from the Trump administration meant the company spent most of the year unsure of it would still be around to see the end of it… [+731 chars]

articles.title: PS5 Restock Update: In Stock At Best Buy Right Now - GameSpot
articles.description: Sony promised more PS5 restocks before the end of the year, and we're tracking availability. Check PS5 inventory and listings right here.
articles.content: The PS5 has received numerous restocks at major retailers over the past week, including Walmart, Best Buy, GameStop, and PS Direct. As expected, all of the available consoles sold out fast. At the mo… [+4792 chars]
